```
> Bob posts, then:
> Bob --[notifies]--> Alice.
> Bob --[notifies]--> Carol.
> Bob --[notifies]--> Malorey. 
> ```

```
> Bob posts, then:
> Alice   --[queries]--> Bob.
> Carol   --[queries]--> Bob.
> Malorey --[queries]--> Bob. 
> ```
